input_email_body:
Subject: Support Request for Unresolved Charges

I am reaching out to seek help regarding unauthorized charges on my account. I have already checked my billing details and reviewed recent transactions but the problem still exists My name is John Doe.. Could you please examine this for me and provide a swift resolution? If you need further details from me, kindly let me know. I await your prompt response. You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.
